projects.title: Desert Oasis Backyard
projects.description: Complete backyard transformation with native desert plants, boulder accents, and a custom water feature. Low-maintenance and stunning.

projects.title: Paver Patio & Outdoor Kitchen
projects.description: Custom travertine paver patio with built-in BBQ, fire pit, and seating wall. The ultimate outdoor entertainment space.

projects.title: Lawn to Xeriscape Conversion
projects.description: Converted 3,000 sq ft of water-hungry turf to beautiful desert xeriscape. Water savings of 70% with year-round color.

projects.title: Smart Irrigation System
projects.description: Rachio smart controller with zone-based drip irrigation. Weather-responsive watering that adjusts to Arizona's seasons automatically.

projects.title: Commercial Property Landscape
projects.description: Full landscape installation for a new office park. Native plantings, decomposed granite paths, and shade structures.

projects.title: Pool Landscape Surround
projects.description: Tropical-inspired pool surround with palms, bougainvillea, and decorative rock. Private resort feel in your own backyard.
